name: bears beets battlestar galactica
description:
Worked on this game solo for the TV GAME JAM https://itch.io/jam/tvgamejam

Was inspired by an episode of The Office, specifically the line about bears, beets, and Battlestar Galactica.

It's a side scroller, strategy, rogulike kinda game.

The start up screens tell you everything you need to know, happy playing.

Update 2019-02-15 6:28 AM: I left the boss health at 1 when I compiled. Updated his health and recompiled, and re-uploaded.
